name: pnp-spfx-reference-scenarios-ace-designtemplate-gallery
title: Adaptive Card Extentions Design Template Gallery and Personal App
shortDescription: This solution showcases twelve sample Adaptive Card Extensions and deploys a personal app to demonstrate deep linking to Teams. It is designed to show the art of the possible for ACE development and allow for a quick start.
longDescription: This solution showcases 12 Adaptive Card Extensions with visually appealing QuickView layouts. It shows the art of the possible with quick view layouts. Some ACEs have deep linking capabilities to the included Teams Personal App. The Personal App handles the deep links but also serves as a gallery of the provided samples.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance

references.name: Building Microsoft Teams Tabs using SharePoint Framework
references.description: Starting with SharePoint Framework v1.8, you can build tabs for Microsoft Teams with the SharePoint Framework tooling and use SharePoint as a host for your solutions. As part of the SharePoint Framework v1.10 you can also publish your solution as Microsoft Teams personal app.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
